message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product I think you'd be interested in. It's worth at least $15000 to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. Let me know what you think!

Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your consideration.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is just below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $17500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $16000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
